transArray.content: The decoration is very tasteful, the store is easy to find, parking is convenient, and the transportation is very convenient. I came here after seeing good reviews. It is indeed as good as everyone praised. The staff is very professional and very patient in solving problems. The hotel hardware facilities They are all very good. It is worth mentioning that the service staff are of high quality. It is a very satisfactory experience. First and most importantly, the room is clean and tidy, the privacy is very good, and the living experience is great!
Dear guest, thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to share your stay experience. You are a little man with a gentleness that is concealed by your publicity. I love you.
